lender.name: Steve and Becky

lender.occupational_info: I am studying beer in hopes to be a master brewer one day. UC-Davis here i come....

lender.name: JANET/BOXER MOM
lender.loan_because: I believe 1 person CAN make a difference

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: My best friends parents helped me afford college which enabled me to get a good job and I want to pass on their generosity to others.

lender.name: Karen & Michael
lender.loan_because: It's important to give people the tools to improve their lives. It's the old "teach a man to fish" thing!

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: Whynot?
lender.occupational_info: Boring yet important...

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I sell business to business communication solutions.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: What goes around, comes around.

lender.name: Lynette
lender.loan_because: I want to spread good will throughout the world and give everyone the chance to be successful and happy.

lender.name: Tonya
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone who is helping themselves and not depending on handouts!

lender.name: Dave & Diane
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Soldier, US Army. I've travelled all over the world and wish to share with the people of the world.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Since I have been lending through Kiva, I have been amazed at how hard people work to pay the loan back. Lending makes me feel like I am making small contributions in people's lives and assisting them to better their world.

lender.name: Yoshiko
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a senior high school. I teach 15 to 55 year olds this year.

lender.name: Dallas Maximus Willis
lender.loan_because: I believe people can make a difference in the world
lender.occupational_info: I keep my family entertained and happy and provide lots of hugs and kisses.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do - - ethically and practically. I think this organizations' concept is wonderful.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.occupational_info: I help people decide which business to invest in.

lender.name: Michael and Kelly
lender.loan_because: We are all connected.

lender.name: Love
lender.loan_because:
The best thing to do in the world is to help someone in need. We all need to help each other if we can regardless of race, gender, religion or idealogy. We are all one and the same.
God Bless

lender.name: Euan
lender.loan_because: I hope someone would do the same for me.

lender.name: Anuj Rajbhandari
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference...
lender.occupational_info: Sharing the love...

lender.name: Sharon deLisser
lender.loan_because: Empowering entrepreneurs in the developing world helps build local economies and creates a sustainable solution to poverty.
lender.occupational_info: When you choose Sharon deLisser, you have made a decision to work with a highly professional team and our commitment to you will be one of integrity, reliability, and satisfaction. Providing customer-focused, quality service, Sharon deLisser achieves success one client at a time. We are uniquely positioned to provide you with the most comprehensive set of programs and services available to RealtorsÂ® today.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.occupation: English as a Second Language Teacher
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance for a better life.

lender.name: Murray
lender.loan_because: Like most Canadians I am altruistic and like to help others whose situation is not as advantaged as ours.
lender.occupational_info: happily retired after working for 50 years

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I want others to be successful and happy!
lender.occupational_info: I help other people by listening to their concerns and providing therapy.

lender.name: Br. Francis Sebastian
lender.loan_because: God had been so good to me and I need to share His grace with others.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: It's a way to make a real difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that creates computer systems to help libraries share their collections with as many people as possible.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great organization! I love that I can help people get on their feet who already have a passion to do it on their own. It's awesome to help motivate someone and really get them moving.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I'm a full time student studying the social sciences so I can teach high school. I work part time in a restaurant as a server.

lender.name: UAA - Alaska
lender.loan_because: We care about building a global community!!!!
lender.occupational_info: We are an energetic group of future teachers and liberal studies majors. We all have one thing in common; to mold the minds of future leaders, banker, farmers, good will ambassadors. We wish to help those that are not in our own back yard.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: Those who have must share.

lender.name: Bud & Pam
lender.loan_because: We want to help others!

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I am able
lender.occupational_info: bakery manager

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want to help people be successful and happy.
lender.occupational_info: I talk with people to help them find solutions to problems.

lender.name: Izzy
lender.loan_because: Feed a person a fish he will eat for a day, teach a person to fish...you get the idea.
lender.occupational_info: I attend to sick children in need

lender.name: Anne and her Mom
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to help. Good luck with your crops. May you have a very green thumb!!
lender.occupational_info: I work at a large bank and I help organize meetings between companies and investors.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to help! I am also starting my own business and I value the time, effort, and hardwork needed to do so. I enjoy knowing I am helping someone achieve the goals and dreams. Kiva has created something amazing and I am thankful I can be a part of it.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently self-employed as model and/or talent for the entertainment industry. I work a variety of special events and love the industry I work in. I also make hand-made invitations for personal events such as weddings, bridal showers, baby showers, etc. I truly believe in doing what you love.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because:
I loan because it's a mitzvah - responsibility - in Judaism. I love humanity.
"For I desire kindness, not sacrifice." (Hos. 6:6)
lender.occupational_info: I teach Hebrew and Judaism to children in Jewish day schools.

lender.name: Bruce Fan Sweden
lender.loan_because: I believe that what comes around goes around.
lender.occupational_info: I help people in need with e.g. legal advices and court proceedings.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: ...too often, we wait for tomorrow to lend a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I help plan and coordinate inspection and maintenance services on our electricity-producing customers' gas turbines and generators.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who show a desire to work hard to improve their economic position.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to operate heavy equipment in order to obtain employment in the construction industry.

lender.name: JLH
lender.loan_because: I can. This is what IT's all about, doing what we can to help others. I have so many blessings; why not share with the world?
lender.occupational_info: I work for a group of doctors. I work to make sure that the health insurance companies pay our patients' medical bills.

lender.name: Annamarie
lender.loan_because: Loaning just a little makes a big difference. Together we can change the world!
lender.occupational_info: I work at a large university as an assistant to a dean. Mainly, I schedule meetings for her and make sure she has everything she needs to make decisions. Next year, I hope to start a PhD program in counseling psychology.

lender.name: jason, cheri, & zev
lender.loan_because: Kiva made it possible!

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I believe that there should be a sharing of resources amongst the whole of earth's inhabitants. God has given me more than others not so I can horde it all to myself, but rather to give of my surplus that others may benefit. Lending is an exciting way to let others become more involved in the commerce in their neighborhood.
lender.occupational_info: Money flows in and out through businesses and also to a much smaller degree families and individuals. Businesses need a person to keep track of the money that comes and goes in the business on a daily, weekly, monthly and annual basis. The business owners benefit from reports that I prepare that show them how their business in doing - sort of like a doctor listening to the heart of a patient to get an understanding of what is going on inside the body.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: I'm a 911 dispatcher and have to deal with stressful situations on a daily basis and in most cases people that I deal with aren't happy and usually not very nice.

lender.name: Elizabeth n Jennie
lender.loan_because: I believe that the KIVA system is the most promising way to make a difference in people's lives on a larger scale.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my daughter who is ill and substitute teach on occasion

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Simple. To help people trying to make an honest living, and provide for themselves and family.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: As a student it's a great way to make a difference.

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone make their life better.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the life that I have and I am excited to assist others to start or grow their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I assist technology companies to develop strategies to create new products and to market them effectively.

lender.name: Tracy & Cole
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do - We are very fortunate and believe it's our duty to pay it forward.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I represent manufacturer's that sell aftermarket auto parts to warehouse distributors and retailers in the midwest region of the U.S.A.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I learned about KIVA from the OPRAH show - always wanted to help others in need. Thank you KIVA for this great opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired government worker. I enjoy crocheting, knitting, baking PIZZELLE cookies, gardening, bird watching and linedancing.

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: People need it more than I do
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in high school

lender.name: Linda & Guy
lender.loan_because: We want to help people in need who are working to help themselves.

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: Since I was child I have always wanted to give back to someone in need. I am big in giving not money (until recently) but my friendship, time, and just help.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work for a car dealership until I got married. Now I have the privledge of not having to work and to just take care of my home, family, and animals.

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: As his mom writing, I'll just say he is amazing. The minute he heard about Kiva he ran to his room and dumped out his piggy bank and we counted it together. I told him he could buy a toy if he wanted with his money (praying he wouldn't smile and say "OK!")... and, of course he said "No way Mom, I want to help!).
lender.occupational_info: Kindergarten is hard work. We are learning how to read, but man this English language is really confusing!

lender.name: C and H
lender.loan_because: It is simply the right thing to do.

lender.name: CAROLINE
lender.loan_because: I admire the people featured on this site who work so hard for their families

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: it feels like I am making a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I am a jazz singer and vocal coach.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want the people of the world to live a better life, to be well fed and happy.

lender.name: Stephenie
lender.loan_because: I have SO much, and I need to remind myself of that...

lender.name: lululovesbella
lender.loan_because: ...there but by the grace of god...
lender.occupational_info: i do accounting in film production - i handle budgets for the building of sets for big budgeted films

lender.name: kathleen
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to see their dreams and hopes come true.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of patients in my office and in the hospital.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I believe we have to pay it forward, in whatever manner we can.
lender.occupational_info: Painting and remodeling contractor.

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupation: Director of faith formation at a Catholic church

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Help the people, I will. Trust in the force.
lender.occupational_info: Jedi Master, Rebel Ship Levitator,

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because:
I care about others. I believe that this is a great way for people to lift themselves out of poverty.
I have also been poor in my life, and I appreciate all the help I got along the way. Now I am able to pass on the gifts I got.
lender.occupational_info: I help operate free schools for 13,000 children 5-18 years of age. Education changes lives.

lender.name: Hai
lender.loan_because:
Aloha! We're living in the most prosperous and free country on earth. I feel that it is part of our duties to help brothers and sisters who are less fortune. These tokens are not a charity, but an encouragement to help entrepreneurs to achieve a higher level of self sufficiency and prosperity.
Many wonderful things like these just don't happen; You and I can make them happen now !!!
lender.occupational_info: We all have the same biology....

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help out others.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I believe you have to give to get back....
lender.occupational_info: I listen to employees and manage risk for our company.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I am currently able, and I like to share. I have had many opportunities to pursue my goals and dreams, and I hope in some small way I can help others do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I design and create web applications. I am also a musician.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world in a way that respects their ingenuity and integrity. I particularly am interested in helping my fellow sisters in retail around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am the store manager of the largest retail store in Antarctica.

lender.name: Katy
lender.occupation: Director of Retail, Vosges Haut Chocolat
lender.loan_because: I have had the great fortune of being able to lead, exercise entrepreneurship and help others and I want to give that same opportunity to other women in business.
lender.occupational_info: I run the retail division of a CHOCOLATE company! The company I work for was founded by a woman and we support women's organizations and many green mission causes. The mantra of our company is "travel the world through chocolate," so our owner and chocolatier creates chocolates that use ingredients from all over the world. I felt like joining Kiva was a great opportunity to exercise the values of my company while giving me an amazing opportunity to personally give back!

lender.name: Tomoko
lender.loan_because: I can give people a little help. I hope everyone will be happier than now.

lender.name: Lars
lender.occupational_info: Product Management for Mobile Software

lender.name: Angel
lender.loan_because: I really like the idea of helping people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work with Developmentally challenged Adults that live on their own yet need assistance to enable them to do so.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people become independent and self-reliant.
lender.occupational_info: I work in internet advertising.

lender.name: David & Martha
lender.occupation: Spare Parts Planner & Medical Case Manager
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to share our blessings with others.

lender.name: George & Jan
lender.loan_because: We enjoy helping make someone's life a little better.

lender.name: kelly
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to make a difference to people who are struggling to provide a life for themselves and their families, and through these loans, entire communities benefit. Not only that, but the loans also enhance the status of women in various societies....and it's so ridiculously easy to make a difference in this way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer - I write television drama. It's wonderful, fulfilling work and I am lucky that my job is also my passion.

lender.name: Scott and Katie
lender.loan_because: We would rather invest in someone with need than to squander it on things we don't.
lender.occupational_info: Aviation and Philanthropy

lender.name: TIEUVAN PHAN
lender.loan_because: It's better to help people to catch fish themselves, not to supply them fish .
lender.occupational_info: I help my customers feel confident for those they wear from my store.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lender.name: Inger
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference for other women in the world.

lender.name: Scott, Teresa & Leigh
lender.loan_because:
Someone, somewhere is praying for help.....We are Blessed to help.
Philippians 4:6 Be anxious for nothing, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God
lender.occupational_info: I am a record keeper, payment of monies, reporting finances to the company.

lender.name: brad
lender.loan_because: "No man is an island unto himself"
lender.occupational_info: I work for an independant rep firm in the Collegiate Fashion Apparel industry

lender.name: Sindy and Gary
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to need money to get a business off the ground. I'm currently in that same position.
lender.occupational_info: I have an invention that assists a caregiver to lift and transfer a patient.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want others to be given opportunities to succeed, like I have.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the medical field.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: What a fantastic way to help small business overseas.
lender.occupational_info: I run an online business and am currently undertaking a degree in Asian Languages and Asian Politics & Culture.

lender.name: Mark & Denise
lender.loan_because: To recycle our donation through multiple business and help people all over the world
lender.occupational_info: One of us works in sports marketing, the other works in a local charity which helps empower the people of East London

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: i believe it gives people a golden oppertunity.
lender.occupational_info: Provide all types of money funding for peoples new homes and businesses

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I want to help an entrepreneur of roughly my own age succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I run the commercial department of a high profile, semi-professional football club in London.

lender.name: melissa
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy

lender.name: Helen Doody
lender.loan_because: I think itâs really important to encourage entrepreneurialism and help people help themselves and in turn help others.
lender.occupational_info: I have recently set up my own company to sell financial products of other companies. In other words I am a middle man (person!) or broker.

lender.name: Monika & Justin
lender.loan_because: I like the personal connection and direct effects of giving this way.
lender.occupational_info: Monika sees and treats people with medical problems. Justin is a researcher.

lender.name: Denis
lender.loan_because: It works. I sleep better. They deserve it.
lender.occupational_info: Geek gone manager. Love making things happen.

lender.name: Lainie
lender.occupation: Small business owners - The Sunglass Fix
lender.loan_because: There are no more excuses to wonder what we as individuals can do to help others in need to improve their lives and support their families. To believe in people and for them to pass that onto their children, to believe in your dreams, is truly a great gift to give.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I run a business where we manufacture high quality sunglass lenses so people can replace their old, scratched lenses or upgrade their existing lens into their own frames.

lender.name: Daniela
lender.loan_because: I believe if you can, you must. Makes me feel great to know I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help my husband run a home automation business. We design custom systems for homes to control everything from the TV's and music to energy management.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: Its such a small amount to lend to someone and it helps them make improvements to theirs and their families lives....
lender.occupational_info: I am working as a registered nurse working on casual contracts. I enjoy the challenge of new places and caring for diverse populations.

lender.name: Lucia and Vance
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to empower small businesses!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a school for students that have trroble learing to read. I am a psychological counselor

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Micah 6:8 He has shown all you people what is good. And what does the LORD require of you? To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with your God.
lender.occupational_info: I am a chemical engineer for a company that is working on biological solutions for industrial problems.

lender.name: CMourot
lender.loan_because: I know that a small group of caring individuals can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children from ages 9-15.

lender.name: FIU Micro Lenders Corp
lender.loan_because:
The FIU Micro Lenders, a new student organizing committee at Florida International University, as well as a non-profit 501c3 Florida corporation is committed to helping fight global poverty. Via mutually beneficial partnerships with local businesses, fund-raising efforts, and encouraging microfinance education for FIU's students they seek to provide tools for everyone to make their own contribution to a better world.
We will continue to forge partnerships within our community, raise awareness of the powerful force of microfinance, and redefine what it means to be an International Business student.
For more information or to join your energies to our fight, please email us at:
fiumicrolenders@gmail.com Second Kiva page at: http://www.kiva.org/lender/fiumicrolenders
lender.occupational_info: We are International Business students enrolled at Florida International University.

lender.name: Faye
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed during my life and want to share with someone less fortunate than me. I want to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: A paralegal works with barristers or lawyers to get justice for those who have been harmed or injured by the wrongful actions of another person or company.

lender.name: keith
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people out. It makes me feel good I mean real good
lender.occupational_info: I do x-rays at the public hospital (we deal mostly with the poor so their is some free health care here in the good old USA)

lender.name: Stephannie
lender.loan_because: it is empowering as a hand-up. We find it important to give to others in any way that we can. We are blessed to have so much more than most.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school teacher, and my son is a student at 16 :)

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: It's that principle, give a man a fish and he eats today; teach a man to fish and he'll feed his whole village. I want to enable a lot of people to eat fish :)

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people make their own dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my two children. They are six and three years old. I want to set an example for the kind of person that I want them to be when they grow up. Being a lender on this web-site is part of that.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I enjoy watching the expansion of people's business'. I am grateful they have the opportunity to grow.
lender.occupational_info: Approve loans for people applying for home loans.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I love the entrepreneurial spirit!
lender.occupational_info: Colorful

lender.name: prince
lender.loan_because: want to start a business like poltry farm. want to help poor people by giving them job.
lender.occupational_info: my total plan is in different phases. my first phase is to start with a poltry farm. which requires a machine which costs 1400 usd. i will finance half of it and reqires loan half of it. in my secound phase i will start a dairy farm. in my last phase i want to start a big company of processing powder milk.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: It's a neat way to expand my philanthropy to a more personal level.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by my mother who started her first business as a minority in the US and single mother of 3. She is now the most successful person I know, in every way. She taught me to be successful too and now I want to pass whatever blessings I am able to on to as many people I can.
lender.occupational_info: I own a yoga studio in downtown los angeles (across the street from world known landmark- The Disney Concert Hall). I also own a coaching seminar business and television production company with my husband. Most importantly I am pregnant with twin girls.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I've been without before - I've been blessed with enough and then some now. It is God's commandment that those to whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Cathryn
lender.loan_because: my husband and i are both disabled. we receive benefits from uncle sam and live a frugal life. we are so grateful for what we have and wanted to share. we are very lucky to have what we have and live in a country which takes care of it's disabled people. we want to give back what we can to someone who is working to make thier business succeed to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: i am a home-maker, my husband is an artist.

lender.name: tom
lender.loan_because: it gives me joy and purpose to pass on my blessings from God to others who in turn plant their own seeds of love and self-reliance.

lender.name: Renate
lender.loan_because: I was just given a wonderful gift and I want to share my good fortune with others

lender.name: The Atchisons
lender.loan_because: Because we care.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than me and to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in buying and selling real estate.

lender.name: Shaun & Dawn
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in someone's life and their community.

lender.name: Chandra
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to be part of other's success.
lender.occupational_info: Creative at times ..

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I've been given so many opportunities; I want to be able to give the gift of opportunity to others.

lender.name: Saravanakumar
lender.loan_because: I want to uplift the life of a person in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings God has given me with others.

lender.name: GlenlawnB
lender.loan_because: We want to provide a hand up to the developing world; "teach a man to fish to feed himself rather than just giving a fish."
lender.occupational_info: Students learning how to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I believe in micofinancing, regardless of how economically advantageous it is to prosperous countries. I say that because as we've learned so painfully, just because you are a developed country doesn't mean that your banking systems are sound or moral. Just because something "works" one day doesn't mean it will the next (i.e. hedge funds). I just want deserving people to be able to borrow money and make a living, period.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to support and encourage people who wish to move toward self sufficiency. I admire those who have an entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I work with organizations and individuals to improve their leadership and management skills through workshops and individual coaching.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: It is a small way to make a big difference!
lender.occupational_info: Working in a local church where we are attempting to follow Jesus, change our community and impact the world.

lender.name: Beverly & Sonny
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us and we want to share these blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I do loans for home purchases and my husband is a retired truck driver.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to start your own business.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I want to help in some way!

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: While I don't have much, God has blessed me tremendously and I want to share these blessings with those in need who are trying to make a living for their families. Working with my husband in his computer consulting business, I know the difficulties that come with owning and running your own business and trying to make it a success.
lender.occupational_info: The work I perform in my husband's business includes the majority of the administrative office duties.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: I constantly hear or see all the horror, poverty, etc. in the world. I have this overwhelming desire to help, assist in some way, GIVEBACK. I wanted to stop being one of those who talks about it and is doing something about it. Kiva is a phenomenal concept that allows one to do this and I am blessed to have gained knowledge of it so I can do my part.
lender.occupational_info: Busy, busy, busy :-) Not enough hours in a day. I work in Music Publishing so it is a gift to be around what I love most, music! I am also a Student completing my degree in Sociology, so I hope to go onto Law School in the next few years and go into Criminal or Family Law.

lender.name: Marg
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info:
I use photography to help people show the world how they want to be seen.
A video about my work in India on my blog:

lender.name: Candy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people all over the world achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I attend university and study Spanish and Women's studies.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I feel a responsibility to help those who are less fortunate and also to teach my children that it is possible to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Life has given me more than I could have ever asked for and I want to pay it forward to others less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I ensure the successful delivery of emerging technologies and interactive solutions for my Organization.

lender.name: BeÃ±at
lender.loan_because: A better world is posible!
lender.occupational_info: I'm manager in a small newspaper written in basque the language of the basque people.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I understand some of the difficulties involved in manifesting my dreams. I hope that the sale of my works which fund me will also help others fulfill their goals too.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist who builds treasure chests. Each is Created with the belief that everyone should have a beautiful, unique and special place to keep the things they treasure...something visible and alive, becoming part of your story. Each is always unique & handmade with an element reminding us that we are all connected and part of something bigger. For example, the treasure boxes are all the same on the inside - just as we are all very different on the outside but consist of the same elements within.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I just want to help people who are trying to improve their lives. It can take just a little from us to make a big difference in another human beings life.
lender.occupational_info: I am blessed to live in a country where I am afforded the opportunity to do whatever I want to do, to have the freedom to have a job and to be able to take care of my family. I hope that my getting involved with Kiva can make someone elses life better.

lender.name: SP Business Students
lender.loan_because: As our school moto states: "Be a living expression of God's kindness." This encourages us to help others and share equal opportunity for all. We hope our small contributions will make a difference in a big way.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of business students from Saint Paul High School in Niagara Falls studying international business, entrepreneurship and accounting.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I don't believe in charity. I believe in solidarity. Charity is so vertical. It goes from the top to the bottom. Solidarity is horizontal. It respects the other person and learns from the other. I have a lot to learn from other people. - Eduardo Galeano

lender.name: Frederic
lender.loan_because: I feel it is investing in my family, the human race!

lender.name: The Giraldi Family
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair chance to start a business.
lender.occupational_info: We help people buy and sell houses.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I have money that i'm more then happy to give to someone else, I know that they need it more then I do so why should I just keep it sitting in a bank.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: there is a need

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: 1 billion people in the world live on less than $1 per day. We have got to change that!
lender.occupational_info: I help people make wise investments with their money.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: Because it is fun!!
lender.occupational_info: I work with young singers helping them to learn the varied skills which will help them become effective performers.

lender.name: McBook
lender.loan_because: I honor my mother, who taught me that you can make a difference in someone's life by giving of yourself.

lender.name: brigitte
lender.occupation: Co Founder of Our New Living, LLC

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: It gives me great satisfaction to see these people of the world advance their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from engineering and now build Windsor Chairs.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: It feels good to share my good fortune with others, whose hard work I admire.
lender.occupational_info: I help student be better readers and writers. I work with high school students ages 14 through 18.

lender.name: Dr. Michael Polsinelli
lender.loan_because: It is fun and brings hope.
lender.occupational_info: To Create the Possibility of Having an Extraordinary Relationship with Our Bodies

lender.name: Zack and Harrison
lender.loan_because: we care!

lender.name: Jeremy and Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: We have an ethical obligation to all of humanity and the environment upon which we rely.

lender.name: Tawnya
lender.loan_because: I believe real economic recovery and change will come from the investments we make in each other and our communities...not from a grand governmental stimulus package filled with corporate bailouts.

lender.name: Jolie
lender.loan_because: It feels great to give back and help others to realize their dreams and create a better life for their families and communities.

lender.name: Vineta
lender.loan_because: I want to empower women so they can be self sufficient to raise their children. I am living in the USA where many opportunities are opened to me and this is my way of giving back.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a wonderful company that supports employee involvement with people all over the world.

lender.name: Kathy & Kathy
lender.loan_because: we can and we should.

lender.name: Rob
lender.occupational_info: I serve a Native American congregation representing 7 Nations and also work with Karen refugees from Burma.

lender.name: MONICA
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others
lender.occupational_info: Born in Peru.... Will see my country one day. Monica

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: As Americans, we have so much that it makes us a target. The path to peace is providing the less fortunate with hope and the opportunity to meet their own basic needs. No one truly wants to have to accept a handout. This program is about empowerment and I just had to be a part of it.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: "You give a man a fish he will eat for a day, you teach a man how to fish [or in this case the ability to fish] he will eat for a lifetime."

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do and I believe that what goes around comes around...karma! :o)
lender.occupational_info: I currently teach 2nd grade children who are 7 and 8 years old. I also design websites and taught technology integration as an Educational Technologist for 5 years.

lender.name: Ron & Linda
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can--it is nice to help someone who is trying to make a difference for themselves.

lender.name: Lyn
lender.occupation: Retired from In Home Child Care Provider
lender.loan_because: It feels wonderful to support others who desire to grow their lives into a greater expression.
lender.occupational_info: After a wonderful career in family child care, I now spend my days enjoying life with my soulmate husband, spending time with family & especially my grandson, Jake!

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I hope that I can make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Gamal
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world and in peoples life.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: It is a great opportunity! A little money to start someone on the road to indepedence.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of family, friends and those in need.

lender.name: Yolande
lender.loan_because: I have been bless to live in a country as rich as canada and I want too do my part in helping other less fortunate than I am. I was given everything in life by my parents and now I feel its my time to give back. the "circle" of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a fertilizer plant contracted out by one of the largest oil company in Canada. I am in charge of making sure all equiptment is operating correctly and reporting any malfunction to maintenace department, also monitoring the computer system.

lender.name: Tina
lender.occupation: Student/ Full time mom of Three
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful opportunity! I am overseas with the Military and saw Oprah on AFN and could not go to bed with out helping someone in need! I believe my family and I are getting just as much out of this as the person we are helping somewhere in the world!
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time mom and student working towards my Bachlor degree in Education! I have two more years of college before I become a teacher!

lender.name: Nayantara
lender.loan_because: i was taught to share.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of Paying It Forward. The entrepreneur gets the loan and may even provide jobs for others in the community. It is a beautiful and powerful idea.

lender.name: Opie
lender.loan_because: I believe in the old adage "Give someone a fish and you feed them for a day. Teach someone to fish and you feed them for a lifetime." I wish someone would give ME some fish.
lender.occupational_info: I sleep and sun myself while my owner raises money for a nonprofit .

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I am living by example for my children. Even though we don't have much ourselves, when we are able to share it helps to see that yes even we can make a difference in our world if we just take time & give a little of ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a college in Wichita Kansas. I answer phones & enter data in the computer. I do alot of paperwork for accounts receivable.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a physical education and public speaking teacher.

lender.name: Mission Coffee Roasters
lender.loan_because: This is a fantastic way to help others, and it is fun!
lender.occupational_info: We import and roast coffee for resale to coffeehouses and cafes for the glory of Jesus Christ who died for your sins so that you may have relationship with His Father, God, by placing your trust in Jesus.

lender.name: maria
lender.loan_because: This is an incredible way to help people.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I believe in people empowering themselves.

lender.name: Faith & Ken
lender.loan_because: We would like to help make a difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: We have a cabinet shop that we started 28 years ago. We started with nothing and have built a successful business and hope for the same for others.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: i'd rather teach a man to fish than give them a fish of my own.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a farmer

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I love God and all His children. It is an honor and my duty to share my blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach grammar, writing, and American literature to high school students at a Christian school in Tennessee, USA.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.occupation: Finance Manager for Habitat for Humanity

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help others to help themselves. Over time, my $25 could help dozens of people!
lender.occupational_info: I help teachers to be more effective in teaching kids who have difficulty learning.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I believe people have a moral duty to give something to others who are needy. I wish to help relieve suffering and poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of humanities at the college level. I also teach yoga and my practice of yoga is an important part of my life.

lender.name: Ismay
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that I'm able to help someone improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I help our customers in all manners of banking. Opening new accounts, funding their retirement accounts, saving for special occasions, etc.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for my son. I want to teach him the value of giving. I want my son to know that although he may not think he has a lot to offer, even a small gift can change a life.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Pay it forward!

lender.name: Doc
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Technology Services

lender.name: Rodrigo
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am a prosecutor who handles municipal offenses.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I believe that $25 is a very small price to pay to help someone achieve their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I deliver mail and packages by walking a route to 469 families within my city.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: I wish to share my good fortune with deserving people who are attempting to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I provide mental health services to patients in a state-run psychiatric hospital.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: Maybe I can make a small difference.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: its amazing to be able to help someone on the other side of the world - and actually know that it is helping them.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I will tell you why just as soon as I can stop crying from the joy of being able to give the little bit I have to give to someone / people whose needs are few. I am so excited just to have this opportunity that I am just besides myself. I don't have much, but I do have enough to make a small difference is someone's life and I consider an honor and a priviledge to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the legal litigation department of corporate America.

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: I can and want to help others.

lender.name: jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I just think it's great to help people less off than myself (I'm the luckiest person I know) and it just keeps on getting better. I will continue this untill it stops.
lender.occupational_info: Cleaning cleaning cleaning, thats it hard work, I have health issues from RSI and the chemicals we use here to clean.

lender.name: Cydney
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed in my life, this is my way to share with others. I have been a small entrepreneur and celebrate the desire and dedication of small business owners around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people exploring their faith and spirituality.

lender.name: Romy & Alexander
lender.loan_because: I like the idea to help someone to build up something. Give them a chance to be succesful in their own way.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to get healthy while getting wealthy too. So I share the NONI story with everybody and anybody that is interested.

lender.name: Cindy Samco
lender.occupational_info: I manage Web sites.

lender.name: Mary Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to succeed and know the feeling of accomplishment.

lender.name: Maile
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my children that a small effort can make a large impact.
lender.occupational_info: I am passionate. I love people. I strive to make a difference.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I think it will be amazing to help someone get a business started and then get repaid only to pay it forward again!
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office as an associate dealing with peoples finances.

lender.name: Bryn and Andy
lender.loan_because: It's important.

lender.name: Nancy Treacy
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have opportunities that others don't

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I now can; there was a time I couldn't. It took work & a little help. I'm happy to be a part of the little help.
lender.occupational_info: I review files & databases of facilities regulated by federal and state governments. Zzzzzz. At least the aerial photos are interesting.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: a small donation on my part can make a big difference for someone else. I am blessed with so much and this is my way of giving back.

lender.name: DANIEL
lender.loan_because: I AM ABLE TO.

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: I really like the idea of helping people help themselves,versus a handout!
lender.occupational_info: I play in an orchestra ,that accompanies ballet dancing,,and many soundtracks to movies,cds,etc!

lender.name: Smith Family
lender.loan_because: Helping people is the best gift we can give.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone has the right to a better life. I know that any little thing helps. I'm glad to help people from around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student studying to become a high school Biology teacher

lender.name: Uma
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to live happy and prosperous life.
lender.occupational_info: Home maker

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life that can also affect others. We are all part of the same world, same race...the human race. To touch someone else's life helps to give meaning to mine. May you be blessed everyday will happiness and peace. You are loved.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an assistant to three directors and their staffs in a real estate company that owns shopping malls. I'm currently working as a temporary employee for this company and hope to become a permanent employee soon.

lender.name: Carrie and Ken
lender.loan_because: $25 is less than we spend at happy hour with friends, so there's really no excuse not to!!

lender.name: Kelli
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to be able to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I own a business that faciliates adoptions in the U.S. My work is challenging and rewarding at the same time.

lender.name: Adonica
lender.loan_because: "We must be the change we wish to see in the world." Ghandi
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses with import/export and trade regulations

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: Lovonna
lender.loan_because: I want be apart of something that matters.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the Aviation Industry on the behalf of the U.S. government.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with others.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: thankfully, I can... and it feels good to help!

lender.name: My Friend Bob
lender.loan_because: It's fun! I like to help out others. I also like the idea that I can invest in a business that can make a difference - even if it is on the other side of the world.
lender.occupational_info:
Go here:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guerilla_gardening

lender.name: Tristin
lender.loan_because: I want to help others, and this is a way anyone can help for just $25.00

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I can, and I want to help.

lender.name: Eve-Marie
lender.loan_because: I, myself, have been helped by other people thru my life and it feels good to finally find a way to give some help back.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur in real estate. I also do voluntary work on a streetwise social workers' project to help people suffering of mental health problems. I am also a member of the board on "la SociÃ©tÃ© d'Habitation du QuÃ©bec", Quebec's para-govermental society taking care of social housing.

lender.name: Greenly
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student.

lender.name: Angel, Russ, Zoe & KK
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am honored to be a part of this amazing business idea. I truly believe if people will participate in Kiva it will change the world in huge and wonderful ways. Bravo Kiva!!
lender.occupational_info: My job is amazing! I am on call 24 hours a day and work for hugs and kisses. :0) I am especially excited to loan to other mommas who are working hard to take care of their children. You are an inspiration. Thanks for letting us be a small part of your lives.

lender.name: Mary & Becky
lender.loan_because: My parents taught our family the joy of giving from the time we were young children ~ and it's a tradition we have continued. I hope those who receive will one day be in a position to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I research our family history to uncover our ancestry, stories, legends and information about our past to share with our children and to pass on to future generations.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to help other have a chance to make a living and make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of medics in the United States Army. I help take care of the medics and their needs so they can take care of others and save lives.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: blessed are the merciful for they will be shown mercy- Matthw 5:7
lender.occupational_info: College Student

lender.name: Jaci
lender.loan_because: when my husband and I started our mfg company, there were many people who supported us in ways that completely surprised us! Now its our turn.
lender.occupational_info: We have an injection molding company - we make plastic stuff.

lender.name: Mark and Jionela
lender.loan_because: Since joining the Navy I've had the opportunity to visit twenty four countries around the world and met my wife in Panama. Each and every place I visited I was treated as a friend. It is now time for me to say thank you.

lender.name: Bernadette
lender.loan_because: I should do everything I can for other people
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in development economics and i have been inspired by microfinance programs across the globe.

lender.name: Geoffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I operate the computers for my company's business on the Internet.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Yaro & Dave
lender.loan_because: it is important for all of us to help others

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: A little of something is better than a lot of nothing.
lender.occupational_info: Selling a service to help companies manage their printers.

lender.name: Tracy & Mike
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Happy Mommy
lender.loan_because: I believe in Tikkun Olam.

lender.name: angelica
lender.loan_because: I see it as a way to empower women around the world to become entrepenuer and help their families .
lender.occupational_info: I am a health care professional that assist injured people in get ing well again.

lender.name: Jeff Wilhite
lender.loan_because: Christ is Lord.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software for electric companies.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunities we in North America are lucky to have.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I can, so I should- I'd like to think someone would do it for me.
lender.occupational_info: Network Install and Repair (Routers and Switches)

lender.name: Reuben
lender.loan_because: microfinance works!
lender.occupational_info: Organize people to do stuff.

lender.name: Ricardo
lender.loan_because: To help people in need achieve their goals

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to help, but didn't know how. I would donate money, but I always wanted to have more of a relationship and idea where the money was going.

lender.name: The Nightingale Family
lender.loan_because: we are blessed and we believe we should.

lender.name: James
lender.occupation: Geologist- I'm the balding old guy in the photo
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: My work is to understand the changing landscapes of the Great Plains during the past 40 million years. I also build stone poems.

lender.name: Cindy & Chris
lender.loan_because: This is a great way for people to start the process of getting out of poverty. They feel accomplished by making their own money, and I am more than glad to be part of the process. Loaning is the easy part, these brave people are doing the real work. Micro-financing is an innovative idea in the fight against poverty. We need more ideas like this one. It just feels good to help someone help themself!

lender.name: Clara
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others in ways that I can
lender.occupational_info: I work with high poverty at risk kids

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: Feels great! It's simple - people helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a government agency that helps adults, children, the elderly and disabled.

lender.name: Oak
lender.loan_because: Life is so much harder in other parts of the world. I want to help better another person's life, by giving them the opportunity to help themselves. I feel fortunate to be able to help in my small way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife, mother of 2 young girls, and a Registered Nurse.

lender.name: Kenny
lender.loan_because: i have been blessed with so much that it's my turn to reach out and help someone else to be blessed as well
lender.occupational_info: i am a confused worker for the government in Yuma Proving Grounds in Arizona

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I am very grateful for the abundance I have been blessed with and I would like to share it with others.

lender.name: Tim & Andy
lender.loan_because: I hope that I can bring some small amount of change to the world.
lender.occupational_info: Tim helps international TV broadcastsers produce a local version of American reality shows. Andy casts experts, hosts and participants in such TV shows as "Extreme Makeover: Home Edition."

lender.name: Mark Bly
lender.loan_because: I want to help fellow entrepreneurs around the globe to provide for their families and foster ethical business practices in every occupation.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I believe it will help people overcome poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I manufacture chemicals that are used in paints, autos, wind energy.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I believe that creative capitalism is the change we need to move from what we are today in order to bring a new thinking for tomorrow.

lender.name: Fabian
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I want to set a good example for my children so they learn to share their good fortune.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I can :)

lender.name: Chung Family
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to teach my kids about the many ways they can make a difference around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help to design and build disk drives for computers. These disk drives store information like the list of Kiva projects.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I want to set a good example for my son. I want to show him how one person can make a difference.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: I owned a small business myself for much of my working life. I just love entrepreneurs and the whole idea of entrepreneurship. To use it to help people around the world get out of poverty is just about the most exciting idea I have ever heard of!

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I strive daily to live a compassionate, grace-filled life that includes service to others. I can't say it always works!
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I were merchant marines.... for the last ten years of our working lives we helped run a fish processing "mothership". Smaller fishing boats brought us their fish catch and we would process it and freeze it.

lender.name: samuel
lender.loan_because: Am looking for the loan to assist my people to get printing service
lender.occupational_info: My work is simple I have a digital camera which i wont to use to help my people who work long way to look for this service and printing them, making also caleder

lender.name: Haseeb
lender.loan_because: I want to help humanity.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is a beautiful thing.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: We live like royalty in this country compared to most of the world - the money I will have in Kiva projects will be unnoticable to me, yet very important for someone across the world. I want my children to participate (and lend) as well and see what it is about.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies simplify complicated websites and make it easier for people to find information they need.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I want to help. I've traveled to so many parts of the world and seen these types of entrepeneurs first hand. Now I can make a difference in their lives. Thank you Kiva for making this possible!

lender.name: Kamara D
lender.loan_because: I've been given so much in life. It's my responsibility to my fellow man (& woman) to give something in return. To those whom much has been given, much is expected...
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children (6-8 years old) how to read, write, understand the way numbers work together. But more important, I teach them to treat every human with dignity and respect.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: Global development is a process that involves a two-pronged approach. Large corporations can have positive effects in the communities and areas where they operate (and yes, they can have negative effects, too, which is the risk of working in an imperfect system), but the reality is that even in the best of situations, the "trickle down" results of top-down development only reaches about 80-85% of any given population. The remaining 15-20% matter just as much as the top. That's why I give: I understand that there needs to be a bottom-up, grassroots effort to compensate for the shortcomings of traditional economics, and I know I am able to be a part of it. My faith calls me to respond to the needs of people in the world, and Kiva is a great way to help me live out what I believe is ultimately Christ's call in my life and the lives of those who follow him: Love God, love others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a teacher by training, and as a youth pastor I get to teach kids something I'm passionate about besides literature: God's love and our response to that love. I'm also hoping to apply my education to some very important development work that is going to need to take place in southern Africa in the very near future.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Manage a wide area network for a global corporation.

lender.name: Glen and Jenna
lender.loan_because: It seems that this is an accessible program that actually makes a difference. The ability to see the people and read about their backgrounds and goals makes the effort more tangible. We wish all of the participants the best of luck, and hope that this approach to improving the lives of others continues for a long time to come.
lender.occupational_info: Our job is fun, tiring, stressful, unpredictable and neccessary.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to directly help someone in need
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and an educator

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: it seems to help, and they pay the loan back, so why not?!!!
lender.occupational_info: faculty, NC State

lender.name: Jason & Liz
lender.loan_because: Its an easy and rewarding way to make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Thilo
lender.loan_because: Cause i know what it means to establish a business against all odds.

lender.name: Sherry and George
lender.loan_because: I love to help those who help themselves and to lift them up when they need it the most. As human beings, we should all strive to help those who are in need and be kind to one another. The world is a much better place when people join together to give of themselves however it is defined by each individual.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: The rich have an obligation to help those in need

lender.name: Sten & Karin
lender.loan_because:
We want to help other people to obtain a better life.
We believe it is better to loan money than just to give them away.
Want to help people realize their dreams and goals.
lender.occupational_info: Calm, calm, calm...

lender.name: Mauricio
lender.loan_because: It empowers people to help themselves.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good, and I believe I can make a difference. It's silly for people to need so little when I have so much.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to empower people...

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: good ideas and the people behind them deserve a chance.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: Because I can.

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want to see potential , vision and purposes being full filled in the life's of the people who try to make things happen for them selfs and others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a leader and a teacher in motivation and leadership.

lender.name: Ahmed
lender.loan_because: I want to establish a concrete future for me and my family
lender.occupational_info: I am a disabled man, graduate of computer science, I have graduated for close to 10yrs, but I have not been able to secure a gainful employment, I have great potentials but due to financial constraints, I have not been able to realize the dream. I am expirended in computer hardware and some software practising. I am currently pursuing a study in Wireless Technology to increase my chance of better opportunity in the industry. Unfortunately, I lack the financial capability to pursue my career objectives in Information Technology. CNNA to be specific I will also use the proceed to establish an Info Tech Centre where I wish to be rendering counsultancy service on information technology.

lender.name: sally
lender.loan_because: i am so lucky and have travelled in the developing world and seen what a helping hand can accomplish.

lender.name: StefÃ¡n Bogi
lender.loan_because: I have a lot. Others have not.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: My wife , Judy, began contributing but she passed away. I would like to continue her giving.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I care about people.
lender.occupational_info: I own a manufacturing business where we make dietary supplements

lender.name: LISA
lender.loan_because: I consider myself very fortunate. I want to help others who work hard to improve the lives of their family and themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that produces printed cotton fabrics for quilting/patchwork industry.
